entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow at times overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then partly cloudy. Blowing snow at times in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
